data.eml:eml: A new species of Pontarachna (Acari, Hydrachnidia, Pontarachnidae) from a mesophotic coral ecosystem off Vieques Island, Puerto Rico, Caribbean Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir, Chatterjee, Tapas, Schizas, Nikolaos V. (2012): A new species of Pontarachna (Acari, Hydrachnidia, Pontarachnidae) from a mesophotic coral ecosystem off Vieques Island, Puerto Rico, Caribbean Sea. Zootaxa 3440: 63-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282142
